channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Microsoft blogs

item.title: Upcoming Content Hub AMA supported Data Connectors
item.description:
Hello Sentinel community! Today we are happy to share that new data connectors with AMA support will soon be available in Sentinel's Content Hub.
What's coming:
For data sources that currently use the MMA agent, new connectors supporting AMA will be available in the Microsoft Sentinel Content Hub. These connectors will leverage DCRs for log ingestion. A new tag "Recommended" will be visible to highlight the new connectors in the Content Hub. The legacy connectors will be tagged "Deprecated". Full backwards compatibility for the updated Solutions: Parsers, Analytic Rules, Workbooks, etc. All...
